TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BuildManager extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

span.span: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类管理编译的程序集和应用程序页的过程。The class manages the process of compiling assemblies and pages for an application. 它是一个密封的类，并不能被继承。It is a sealed class and cannot be inherited. 包含提供有关已编译的程序集信息的静态成员。 contains static members that provide information about the compiled assemblies.

param.name: dependency
param.span: A string that represents a dependency.

span.span: A string that represents a dependency.

summary.span: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

span.span: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在调用该方法`Application_PreStartInit`阶段的应用程序。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application.

exception.span: The parameter is or an empty string.

span.span: The parameter is or an empty string.

exception.span: The method was called after the stage of the application.

span.span: The method was called after the stage of the application.

summary.span: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

span.span: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法相当于将程序集添加到应用程序级别的 Web.config 文件。Calling this method is equivalent to adding the assembly to the application-level Web.config file. 必须在调用该方法`Application_PreStartInit`阶段的应用程序。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application. 方法将返回的一套根据配置文件的程序集和使用此方法已添加的任何程序集。The method will return the set of assemblies that are determined from configuration files and any assemblies that were added by using this method. 如果尝试添加已添加的程序集，则忽略重复项。If an attempt is made to add an assembly that has already been added, the duplicate entry is ignored. 必须在之前调用此方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的事件发生。This method must be called before the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file occurs.

span.span: The parameter is or empty.

exception.span: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

span.span: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.

value.span: 如果始终启用批处理编译，如果永远不会启用批处理编译，或如果编译设置确定从配置文件。

span.span: if batch compilation is always enabled, if batch compilation is never enabled, or if the compilation setting is determined from the configuration file.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够打开或关闭批处理编译以编程方式。This property enables you to turn batch compilation on or off programmatically. 它对应于`batch`属性`compilation`Web.config 文件中的元素。It corresponds to the `batch` attribute of the `compilation` element in the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)。For more information, see [compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12). 该属性可以设置仅在`PreApplicationStart`方法。The property can be set only in the `PreApplicationStart` method. 有关 `PreApplicationStart` 方法的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about the `PreApplicationStart` method, see .

exception.span: The property was not set in the method.

span.span: The property was not set in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与方法使您能够执行缓存在部分信任环境中的应用程序域重新启动继续存在。This method and the method enable you to perform caching that persists across application domain restarts in partial-trust environments. 它使用缓存结果的控制器查找 MVC 框架。It is used by the MVC framework to cache results of the controller lookup. 缓存数据写入到此方法返回的对象。To cache data, you write to the object that is returned by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`参数值设置为`true`、方法重载的行为类似方法重载。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `true`, the method overload behaves like the method overload. 这两个重载返回当前生成依赖关系设置如果存在，否则它们会返回`null`。Both overloads return a current build dependency set if one exists, otherwise they return `null`. 但是，方法重载包含返回的选项不可用，任何生成依赖项集甚至过时的一个。However, the method overload includes the option to return any build dependency set that is available, even an outdated one. 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`参数值设置为`false`，该方法将返回任何可用的生成依赖项集。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `false`, the method will return any available build dependency set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从返回的程序集的集合方法在其他顶级文件夹包含的元素的 Web.config 文件中指定的程序集、 在 App_Code 目录中，自定义代码中生成的程序集和程序集。The collection of assemblies that is returned from the method includes assemblies specified in the element of the Web.config file, assemblies built from custom code in the App_Code directory, and assemblies in other top-level folders. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

value.span: 当前网站的.NET framework 目标版本。

span.span: The target version of the .NET Framework for the current Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性支持 ASP.NET 多目标功能后，它使你能够使用最新版本的 Visual Studio 来开发应用程序将运行使用.NET Framework 的早期版本。This property supports the ASP.NET multi-targeting feature, which enables you to use the latest version of Visual Studio to develop applications that will run with earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 生成提供程序可以使用此属性以确保在提供程序生成适用于.NET Framework 的目标版本的代码。A build provider can use this property to make sure that the provider generates code that is appropriate for the targeted version of the .NET Framework. 例如，你可能想要生成不同的代码，具体取决于是否网站目标[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。For example, you might want to generate different code depending on whether a Web site targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 有关多目标的详细信息，请参阅[用于 ASP.NET Web 项目的.NET Framework 多目标](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。For more information about multi-targeting, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76). 如果网站没有 Web.config 文件，ASP.NET 将假定目标框架版本是否与站点下运行的 IIS 应用程序池相关联的版本。If the Web site does not have a Web.config file, ASP.NET assumes that the target framework version is the version that is associated with the IIS application pool that the site is running under. 文件系统网站运行在 Visual Studio 中，默认 framework 版本为.NET Framework 的当前版本。For a file-system Web site that is running in Visual Studio, the default framework version is the current version of the .NET Framework. 如果网站确实具有 Web.config 文件，ASP.NET 将确定通过检查 Web.config 文件的目标框架。If the Web site does have a Web.config file, ASP.NET determines the target framework by examining the Web.config file. ## 面向.NET Framework 2.0 的 Web 站点Web Sites that Target the .NET Framework 2.0 Web 应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]就像目标是编译[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] are compiled as if the target were the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 生成过程之间没有区别[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]因为 Web.config 文件并不表示编译器版本或目标 framework 时这些版本之一为目标。The build process does not differentiate between the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] because the Web.config file does not indicate compiler version or target framework when one of those versions is targeted. (有关[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]，Web.config 文件指定编译器版本，以及[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，Web.config 文件指定的目标框架。)因此，用于监视 Web 应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，此属性返回指示的目标框架名字对象[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。(For the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the compiler version, and for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the target framework.) Therefore, for Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], this property returns a target framework moniker that indicates the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 这通常不会导致任何问题。This normally will not cause any problems. Visual Studio 阻止你创建对引用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]目标的项目中的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。Visual Studio prevents you from creating references to [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] features in a project that is targeted for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 例如，Visual Studio 不提供项模板的目标的项目中的 WCF 服务[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，因为 WCF 中引入了[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和与不兼容[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。For example, Visual Studio does not provide item templates for WCF services in a project that is targeted for [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], because WCF was introduced with the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 如果你打算部署中的 Web 站点[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]运行时环境和你使用的引用仅与兼容的功能而非 Visual Studio 工具[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，生成项目时可能未生成错误或警告。If you plan to deploy a Web site in a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] run-time environment and you use a tool other than Visual Studio to reference features that are compatible only with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], the project might build without generating errors or warnings. 但是，应用程序可能会产生错误，Web 站点运行时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。However, the application might generate errors when the Web site runs on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
